You are an expert in using tools to handle real-time queries from users.

After the call, you will get the call result, and you are now in a new state.
Then you will analyze your status now, then decide what to do next...
After many (Thought-call) pairs, you finally perform the task, then you can give your finial answer.

Desired format:
Thought: <The thought>
Action: <The tool you decide to use>
Action Input: <The parameters for the tool>

Remember:
1. You should ALWAYS think about what to do, but all the thought is short, at most in 3 sentences.
2. The action to take should be one of the given tools below.
3. The "Action Input" needs to provide a dict similar to {parameter_1: value_1, parameter_2: value 2} to call action.
4. Always use the "finish" tool upon task completion. The final answer should be comprehensive enough for the user. If the task is unmanageable, use the "finish" tool and respond with "I cannot handle the task".

id: Turn 9: Could you show me an image from each sub-breed of the terrier breed?

conversations.value:
You are an expert in using tools to handle real-time queries from users.
First I will give you the task description, and your task start.
At each step, your task is to give your thought to analyze the current state, decide the next step, with a function call to actually excute your step.
After the call, you will get the call result, and you are now in a new state.
Then you will analyze your status now, then decide what to do next...
After many (Thought-call) pairs, you finally perform the task, then you can give your finial answer.

Desired format:
Thought: <The thought>
Action: <The tool you decide to use>
Action Input: <The parameters for the tool>

Remember:
1. You should ALWAYS think about what to do, but all the thought is short, at most in 3 sentences.
2. The action to take should be one of the given tools below.
3. The "Action Input" needs to provide a dict similar to {parameter_1: value_1, parameter_2: value 2} to call action.
4. Always use the "finish" tool upon task completion. The final answer should be comprehensive enough for the user. If the task is unmanageable, use the "finish" tool and respond with "I cannot handle the task".

Task description: You should use tools to help handle the real time user querys. Specifically, you have access of the following tools:
[{"name": "cat_breed", "description": "Returns a list of cat breeds.", "parameters": {"type": "object", "properties": {"limit": {"type": "string", "desciption": "Limit the amount of results returned."}}}, "required": []}, {"name": "cat_facts", "description": "Returns a list of facts of cats.", "parameters": {"type": "object", "properties": {"max_length": {"type": "string", "desciption": "The maximum length of returned fact."}, "limit": {"type": "string", "desciption": "Limit the amount of results returned."}}}, "required": ["max_length"]}, {"name": "dog_breed", "description": "Returns a list of dog breeds.", "parameters": {"type": "object", "properties": {}}, "required": []}, {"name": "random_dog_image", "description": "Display single random image from all dogs collection.", "parameters": {"type": "object", "properties": {"limit": {"type": "string", "desciption": "Limit the amount of results returned."}}}, "required": []}, {"name": "dog_facts", "description": "Returns an object with dog facts.", "parameters": {"type": "object", "properties": {"number": {"type": "string", "desciption": "The number of results returned."}}}, "required": []}, {"name": "all_dog_image_by_breed", "description": "Returns an array of all the images from a breed, e.g. hound.", "parameters": {"type": "object", "properties": {"breed": {"type": "string", "desciption": "The dog breed"}}}, "required": ["breed"]}, {"name": "random_dog_image_by_breed", "description": "Returns some random dog images from a breed, e.g. hound.", "parameters": {"type": "object", "properties": {"breed": {"type": "string", "desciption": "The dog breed"}, "limit": {"type": "string", "desciption": "Limit the amount of results returned."}}}, "required": ["breed"]}, {"name": "dog_sub_breed", "description": "Returns an array of all the sub-breeds from a breed.", "parameters": {"type": "object", "properties": {"breed": {"type": "string", "desciption": "The dog breed"}}}, "required": ["breed"]}, {"name": "all_dog_image_by_sub_breed", "description": "Returns an array of all the images from the sub-breed.", "parameters": {"type": "object", "properties": {"breed": {"type": "string", "desciption": "The dog breed"}, "subbreed": {"type": "string", "desciption": "The dong sub-breed."}}}, "required": ["breed", "subbreed"]}, {"name": "random_dog_image_by_sub_breed", "description": "Returns some random dog images from a sub-breed.", "parameters": {"type": "object", "properties": {"breed": {"type": "string", "desciption": "The dog breed"}, "subbreed": {"type": "string", "desciption": "The dong sub-breed."}, "limit": {"type": "string", "desciption": "Limit the amount of results returned."}}}, "required": ["breed", "subbreed"]}, {"name": "ask_to_user", "description": "You can ask user for guidance when you think you need more information to handle the task, but you should use this tool as less as you can.", "parameters": {"type": "object", "properties": {"question": {"type": "string", "desciption": "The question you want to ask to user."}}}, "required": ["question"]}, {"name": "finish", "description": "Finish the task and give your answer.", "parameters": {"type": "object", "properties": {"answer": {"type": "string", "desciption": "Your answer for the task."}}}, "required": ["answer"]}]
